Dear Sir/Madam

I would like to bring to your attention the need to inform companies that even delivery drivers need to go to the toilet, as there are far too  many companies refusing delivery drivers their basic human rights.
May i point out that farmers are required to supply their workers toilets in the field, but yet Truck drivers are refused at their delivery points  where they may have to travel some considerable miles before finding a convenient place to stop .

We ask for your Help

Best Regards

T Duguid
